name: DX12 Demo (Plese Read Description Before You Play)
name_original: DX12 Demo (Plese Read Description Before You Play)
description:
This game is super super early demo and is only playable on Windows and with a Controller The Minimum Specifications for your PC is any RTX graphics card and thats basically it, if you have all of them you can try out this demo. 

The main idea is just shoot those brown targets and i need ideas on what to add so if you have any ideas tell me that aswell.

Controls : Use Left Stick To Move, A To Jump, LB To Aim In And RB To Shoot
